سونا ہائیڈروکلورک ایسڈ کے ساتھ تعاملات ک: Does gold react with hydrochloric acid? Gold resistance to hydrochloric acid

There is no equation because there is no reaction between gold and hydrochloric acid. Gold belongs to the family of noble elements that are not chemically affected by hydrochloric or any other acid and are not oxidized or tarnished in nature.
Does gold react with hydrochloric acid? Gold resistance to hydrochloric acid

Gold belongs to the family of noble elements that are not chemically affected by hydrochloric or any other acid and are not oxidized or tarnished in nature. However, a mixture 3 parts of concentrated hydrochloric acid and one part of concentrated Nitric acid dissolves gold.
